sentences.en: A recruiter can give you insider pointers and advice.
sentences.cn: 一个招聘人可以为你提供内行人的观点与建议。

sentences.en: Address the Recruiter: Start your letter with the date.
sentences.cn: 写给招聘员工: 信件的开始写上期.

sentences.en: An excellent question a recruiter may be inappropriate for an executive.
sentences.cn: 唯一问招工打工人们最合适的疑难题目却不确定合适问高级主管.

sentences.en: Here are four things you shouldn't ask of a recruiter.
sentences.cn: 以下四件事在你和招聘人员打交道中应该要禁止的.

sentences.en: Ideally, working with a recruiter should be a win - win situation for everyone.
sentences.cn: 理想上, 对每个人来说,同招聘人合作应该都是双赢的局面.

sentences.en: If that doesn't work, do a Web search on the term "recruiter" or "HR director" along with the name of your employer of choice.
sentences.cn: 如果这招无效的话，那就在网站上输入你可选择的雇主名单加上“招聘人员”或“人力资源部经理”一起搜索。

sentences.en: If you feel the recruiter can't meet the challenge, you may need to raise the issue with the head of recruiting or human resources.
sentences.cn: 如果你觉得招聘人员无法完成这一挑战，你可能就得把问题提交给招聘或人力资源部门的负责人了。

sentences.en: Mr. Recruiter, Tear Down This ATS!
sentences.cn: 招聘专员们,拆掉你们的自动试验系统!

sentences.en: Once applies for the job the relationship between he and recruiter starts.
sentences.cn: 一旦报名视同《劳务用工合同》关系开始建立.

sentences.en: Once, right before an interview a recruiter came into my office.
sentences.cn: 曾经有一次, 招募人员在面谈前来我的办公室.

sentences.en: Recruiter Peter Polachi recently met with a an executive - level marketing job a midsize technology firm.
sentences.cn: 招聘专员彼得·波拉奇(PeterPolachi)最近见过一位求职者,后者申请的是一家中等规模的技术公司销售主管的职位.

sentences.en: The recruiter greets everyone with a firm handshake.
sentences.cn: 招募者紧紧握住每个人的手,向他们表示祝贺.

sentences.en: The recruiter is too the prime person to answers questions about the hiring process.
sentences.cn: 招工打工人们还得回答招工程式的最佳人选.
招聘人员: 统观大局的人.

sentences.en: The tele recruiter is prompted by a variety of questions, depending on your answers.
sentences.cn: 针对你不同的回答, 这位考官还会提出些不同的问题.

sentences.en: Therefore, if recruiting is a major function, it may be in the company's best interest to have a professional recruiter and another employee to handle all the other functions.
sentences.cn: 因此，如果招聘是一个重要的职能，符合该公司的最大利益的做法是，有专业的招聘人员和另一名雇员来处理所有其他职能。

sentences.en: Think of the recruiter as a respected coworker and treat them accordingly.
sentences.cn: 将招聘人员当作一位你尊敬的同事,并以尊敬的态度对待他们.

sentences.en: We can identify two specialisms within the recruiter's role.
sentences.cn: 在招聘岗位我们可以分为两个专业领域.

sentences.en: You'll be prepared to answer all the recruiter's questions and t be distracted.
sentences.cn: 那样,回答问题时就能做好准备、不会分心.
